description: This file contains Alembic migration scripts for initializing the database schema of the KindlePlus Backend, including creation of tables for users, categories, books, and related associations.

methods.name: _timestamps
methods.description: Helper function to define created_at and updated_at timestamp columns with default values.

methods.name: upgrade
methods.description: Defines the schema changes to upgrade the database to this revision, creating tables and indexes.

methods.name: downgrade
methods.description: Defines the schema rollback steps, dropping tables and indexes in reverse order.
